thread.title: These teen girls took flawless bathroom selfies with an older woman after she reminisced about her younger days
thread.title_full: These teen girls took flawless bathroom selfies with an older woman after she reminisced about her younger days

author: Daryl Lindsey
title: These teen girls took flawless bathroom selfies with an older woman after she reminisced about her younger days
text:
These teen girls took flawless bathroom selfies with an older woman after she reminisced about her younger days A group of Canada teens and the older woman they met in a bathroom proved you’re never to old for a good mirror selfie .
Mahri Smith, 18, told Buzzfeed News she and some friends went to a casino in Ottawa for a night of fun.
While snapping some super-cute selfies in the bathroom, Smith said an older woman came up to her to compliment her outfit. “I remember when my girlfriends and I would get dressed up and go out,” the woman told Smith, according to a tweet that has since been re-tweeted more than 75,000 times. “I miss that.” Smith had the best response ever to the woman’s comment:
“Why miss it? We are all out right now, aren’t we?” pic.twitter.com/LbzQZQRreM 
— mahrmaid (@SmithMahri) January 29, 2017 

The teens and the woman proceeded to take the cutest selfies of all time, reminding us that age ain’t nothin’ but a number and you’re never too old for a night out on the town with some good friends.
